51#ifndef AM_UTIL_SWD_H
52#define AM_UTIL_SWD_H
53
54#if defined(AM_PART_APOLLO3_API) || defined(AM_PART_APOLLO4_API) || defined(AM_PART_APOLLO5_API)
55#else
56#error "Error: am_util_swd.h only supports Apollo3 and Apollo4, Apollo5."
57#endif
58
59//*****************************************************************************
60//
62//
63//*****************************************************************************
64#define APOLLO4_COOPER_INTERNAL 1
65
66//*****************************************************************************
67//
70//
71//*****************************************************************************
72#if defined(AM_PART_APOLLO3_API)
73#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWDIO_PIN 6
74#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWCLK_PIN 5
75#elif defined(AM_PART_APOLLO4_API) || defined(AM_PART_APOLLO5_API)
76#if APOLLO4_COOPER_INTERNAL
77#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWDIO_PIN 97
78#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWCLK_PIN 98
79#else
80#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWDIO_PIN 71
81#define AM_UTIL_SWD_SWCLK_PIN 70
82#endif // APOLLO4_COOPER_INTERNAL
83#endif // AM_PART_APOLLO4_API || AM_PART_APOLLO5_API
84
85#if defined(AM_PART_APOLLO3_API)
86#define AM_UTIL_SWD_OUTPUT_CFG g_AM_HAL_GPIO_OUTPUT
87#define AM_UTIL_SWD_INPUT_CFG g_AM_HAL_GPIO_INPUT
88#elif defined(AM_PART_APOLLO4_API) || defined(AM_PART_APOLLO5_API)
89#define AM_UTIL_SWD_OUTPUT_CFG AM_HAL_GPIO_PINCFG_OUTPUT
90#define AM_UTIL_SWD_INPUT_CFG AM_HAL_GPIO_PINCFG_INPUT
91#else
92#error
93#endif
95
96//*****************************************************************************
97//
100//
101//*****************************************************************************
102#define AM_UTIL_SWD_VARIABLE_POOL_SIZE 512
103#define AM_UTIL_SWD_FIXED_BUFFER_SIZE 20
104#define AM_UTIL_SWD_FIXED_BUFFER_COUNT 1024
106

111//

114#define AM_UTIL_SWD_READ_BLOCK_SIZE 32
